dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent must land a spacecraft in the center of a landing zone using as little fuel as possible. The reward components include penalties for crashing and engine usage, and shaping rewards to encourage the agent to stay upright and land with both legs.
dcterms:title: Lunar Lander

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent learns to make a 2-legged robot walk. The reward components include a reward for forward progress, a penalty for falling, a cost for actions, and a shaping reward to discourage head movement.
dcterms:title: Bipedal Walker

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A variant of the Bipedal Walker environment that adds additional obstacles for the agent to navigate, making the task more challenging.
dcterms:title: Bipedal Walker Hardcore

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent learns to control a one-legged robot to hop forward. The reward components include a reward for forward progress and a cost for actuator actions.
dcterms:title: Hopper

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent controls a cheetah to run forward. The reward components include a reward for forward progress and a healthy bonus for remaining upright.
dcterms:title: Half Cheetah

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent controls a 2D walker to move forward. The reward components include a reward for forward progress, a cost for actuator actions, and a healthy bonus.
dcterms:title: Walker2d

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent controls a four-legged robot to move forward. The reward components include a reward for forward progress, a cost for actuator actions, and a healthy bonus.
dcterms:title: Ant

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An environment where an agent controls a humanoid robot to walk. The reward components include a reward for forward progress, a cost for actuator actions, and a healthy bonus.
dcterms:title: Humanoid
